lines.text: Can't we just talk about this?
[a possessed Don Parker shoots at Jonathan]
Guess not.
This is screwball beyond belief.
That was clever of you grabbing that gun and shooting me right through the fuckin' knee, you little peckerhead!

[Pinker's execution]
Does the prisoner have any final words?
[narrows his eyes at Jonathan]
Your pitiful memories wiped it all out, didn't it? I was beatin' you real good when your mama tried to stop me with the gun.

[angrily]
YOU SHUT YOUR MOUTH, YOU FUCK!

[calms him down]
The prisoner has a right so speak.

[grinning evily]
That's right. I was beatin' you real good when your mama tried to stop me with the gun that she brought into our happy home. You must've remembered it boy. Don't you remember the way she screamed? And how clever you were picking up that gun and shootin' me right through the fuckin' knee, you little peckerhead! Oh, such a big gun, just blastin' at your dear old dad with murder in your eyes. Like father, like son, huh?
[Pinker chuckles evilly as Jonathan is shocked to hear all of this and then narrows his eyes at the Executioner]
Well what are you waiting for, dickhead? You wanna fry me, then get it over with you bunch of fuckin' insects!

[to one of the security guards]
Well, you heard the man.

[after freezing Pinker with a remote control in the t.v world]
It's Showtime!
Hey! What the hell are you doing?

[smiles cockily]
You bought into t.v., Pinker. So now you're bound by it's rules.

[singing]
Time is on my side.
You on drugs or what?
We can't go killing people just to get Pinker out of their bodies.
Come on, boy, let's take a ride in my Volts Wagon.
Awww, you're breakin' my fuckin' heart!

[after being captured by the cops, Pinker taunts Jonathan]
Oh by the way... she died real hard, ya know? Your girlfriend?

[Pinker chuckles with glee and Jonathan tries to pounce on him as Lt. Parker restrains him]
I'LL SEE YOU DEAD, YOU SON OF A BITCH!
So you like killin' too, huh squirt? It's in the blood... you and me, we're killers.
YOU'LL DIE, YOU MOTHERFUCKER! I'LL SEE YOU DIE... YOU FUCKER!

[taunting]
Oh, ho, ho, ho! You're breakin' my fuckin' heart!

[tries to restrain an angry Jonathan, after Pinker is taken away, taunting him about Allison's death]
Easy now! You want him gone? Let the state do it for you! He'll fry for sure... he's history!

[whispers miserably]
I wanna be there.

[puzzled]
What?

[turns to face him]
If they give him the chair Don, I wanna be there.
Don't be crazy. It's over. Now let it go.

[shakes his head]
I wanna see him die, Don. I've earned it... I wanna see him die!

[thinks about it and nods his head]
Yeah... yeah, maybe we've both earned it. I'll get box seats.
Ahh, my kind of town!
You like killing too, huh? There's nothing about it. We're killers.

[Trying to start bulldozer]
Come on, you fucker! Move!
It's no good, Pinker; Alison told me the secret. Maybe you *were* my father, but you know who my father is now? You know who's responsible for me? Me; no one else.
I've heard of audience participation shows, but this is ridiculous.
Holy shit! It's him, Horace Pinker! What are you staring at? Get the camera on him!
Special bulletin, huh? I'll give you a show.

[after biting a guard's fingers]
Finger lickin' good!
[laughs]

[Pinker looks apparently dead]
Fucker alive?
I don't know!

[Pinker suddenly recovers]
Well I'm fine boys, just fine.
[laughs]
Let's get on with the killing.
Come to look death in the face, huh schoolboy?
This BarcaLounger's gonna kick your ass, boy!

[Jonathan and Pinker are fighting through several channels of televison]
Well we still have no word from our reporter at the home of Lt. Parker. However, incredibly, we have begun to receive unconfirmed reports of unexplained "appearances" of Jonathan Parker and a man who looks very much like executed mass murderer Horace Pinker, fighting at least what appears to be...

[during a boxing match, to boxer]
Kick his ass!
...programming of several local stations during the last several minutes. However...

[Jonathan is suddenly thrown onto the news desk by Pinker and runs away. Pinker looks at the camera]
And that's the way it is.
[chases after Jonathan]

[shocked]
Did you get that?
Jesus. That chair really kicks ass.
It smells like the goddamn electric chair in here.

[Pinker is still trapped inside the television]
You bastard! Come back in here! Come back in here, you shit! Don't ever turn the TV on, boy! I'll be there! I'll be there waitin' for ya! I'll look over your shoulder, you little bastard! Come back in here! Come back!
[Jonathan grabs a remote and turns off the TV]
Come on! Give it to me!
You got it, baby.
[Pinker is zapped with electricity]
I eat this wimp's will power for breakfast, John-bo.
